creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
When Dreamweaver checks in a file it also tries to delete .mno files from the
Lenya filesystem.  Here is the request/response from the axis log.

==== Request ====
DELETE /default/webdav/_notes/tutorial_en.html.mno HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:3333
User-Agent: Dreamweaver-WebDAV-SCM1.02
Authorization: Basic bGVueWE6bGV2aQ==
Translate: f
Connection: Close

==== Response ====
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error

Created attachment 17912
webdav DELETE patch

WebDAV DELETE method now checks whether the requested file exists on the server
before deleting.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
